column1: Kata Robata////This place USED to be our favorite sushi restaurant.  We hadn't been to Kata Robata in a while
column2: but decided to treat ourselves and left very disappointed.  They significantly reduced their sushi roll portion sizes and their prices have stayed the same.  For $18/roll we were expecting to receive better than average size portions like they used to serve
column3: but instead they are so small you have to order at least 2 rolls if you want to share with another person.  And don't bother going to Azuma
column4: they've done the same thing.  If you value your dollar
column5: don't go here.  I'll be sure to go to the plenty of other sushi places in the area next time.
